title: BRIEF-Jupai says Q4 revenue rose 35.9 pct to Rmb 460 mln
text:
March 12 (Reuters) - Jupai Holdings Ltd:
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 35.9 PERCENT TO RMB 460 MILLION * ‍INCOME FROM OPERATIONS IN Q4 OF 2017 WAS RMB63.8 MILLION (US$9.8 MILLION), A 32.2% DECREASE FROM RMB94.1 MILLION​
* ‍ANNOUNCED THAT BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS APPROVED AND DECLARED A CASH DIVIDEND OF US$0.1 PER ORDINARY SHARE​
* ‍NON-GAAP NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO ORDINARY SHAREHOLDERS IN Q4 OF 2017 WAS RMB101.4 MILLION (US$15.6 MILLION), A 41.5% INCREASE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
